a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Share of population with cancer vs. median age, 1990
Estimated share of the population with cancer versus median age .
Data source: IHME, Global Burden of Disease (2024); UN, World Population Prospects (2024)

Note:
Non-melanoma skin cancers
are excluded due to potentially incomplete records and inconsistent registry practices.
